# Ignore the Library folder
Library/

# Ignore Temp folder
Temp/

# Ignore Build results
Build/
Builds/

# Ignore obj folder
obj/

# Ignore user-specific files
UserSettings/

# Visual Studio files
.vs/
*.csproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Unity generated meta files (tracked by git)
# (these should be committed so donâ€™t ignore them)

# Crash reports
sysinfo.txt

# Autogenerated VS/MD solution and project files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
